website_summaries.verdict: A simple, modern set that offers a sturdy table at a reasonable price. Though it only sits 2, it's a great breakfast nook table.
pros: Extension flaps allow it to  press flush against a wall or add a little space with a round table
cons: Might be too small for adults over 6 feet tall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little table! I live in a small 1 bedroom apartment and this is perfect. There are two flaps on the table that fold down to make it smaller. I'm a big girl and the chairs hold my weight... they feel very sturdy and I don't feel like I'm going to break it. Could probably hold up to a 300lb person no problem. Shipping was pretty slow but I knew it would be when I bought it so thats not a problem. Took me about 3 hours to put it together on my own. Solid wood, sturdy, great buy!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: MarieStar

customer_reviews.title: This set was exactly what I was looking for! I'm so glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Set is PERFECT for our small NYC apartment! This set is exactly what I was looking for. The color is true to the picture (and matches the wood in the rest of my kitchen). Contrary to other reviews I've read, assembly was a breeze. 30 minutes to assemble both chairs and table legs. Would ABSOLUTELY recommend if you're looking for a nice, small set!
customer_reviews.author: Allison McKenna

customer_reviews.title: The size is great for a small apartment
customer_reviews.text: The size is great for a small apartment. The chairs are wide but the height of back support is short. All the items were simple to put togther with an allen key. You will need a screw driver for the cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Littlewoman

customer_reviews.title: Poor exterior protection 2
customer_reviews.text: Cons: 1. Poor exterior protection 2. Dents/scratches on brand new table (quality assurance is awful) 3. Assembly parts missing (flat washer missing) 4. Difficult to open package unless you have a leathernan handy. Pros: Wood quality is good Paint is elegant
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, great quality for the price. I really love this table and chairs--and it's actually real wood, even better. It fits my small NYC apartment perfectly. The chairs will fit under either side of the table which was a consideration for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This table and chairs is quite nice. It doesn’t look asl if you put it together as the set has a finished look about it. The table is quick and easy to assemble but the chairs took me a while, although other reviewers didn’t seem to have as hard a time as I. One thing that’s especially nice is you can use the table as a 36” round, with a 90” round tablecloth, for example, or change the look by removing the tablecloth and letting the leaves drop. I will be proud to invite a date for dinner with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Berkshires

customer_reviews.title: Table is great, chairs not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging came a bit wet in a corner, but there's a lot of styrofoam inside so the table itself wasn't wet. It's fairly easy to assemble for one person, took me about 30-40 mins. The instructions to assemble the chairs aren't great or would have taken more than 20 mins. The table is very solid and the finish is great. The chairs are shockingly small. I'm 5'7" and just about fit on the chair. Also, the base and foam are quite thin. That said, it's a great little set for a small space and the price.
customer_reviews.author: shortsightedone

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little table! I have it in my tiny house. I Dont have space in my kitchen for a table. So, when I have people over this will be a sweet spot to sit, drink, eat and relax! I recovered the chair pad, very easy and cheap to do!
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect space saving table for two
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. the chairs are okay to eat. They're not to sit in all day. I am 4'11 and my spouse is 5'8 and we are just fine. It's great that each side opens to make it round or close it for a small rectangular table. The table was easy to assemble; however the chairs were a bit tricky and i needed assistance. The instructions were not the best in that part. Overall, I would recommend this table and chair set because for my small space (without a dining room) its a perfect fit in my living room :)
customer_reviews.author: Pace alum

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED - ZERO STARS IF I COULD
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this zero stars, if I could have! Although the description was posted as "packaging and item were slightly damaged", it was said to be in good or very good condition. There was to be a table and 2 chairs. When we opened the package, the chairs were missing, and loose bolts and nuts had damaged the table top in numerous locations. Very disappointing experience all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A Hemmelgarn

customer_reviews.title: Best table I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: Every piece of hardware was accounted for and easy to assemble. Took about an hour and a half from start to finish. You will need a Phillips head screwdriver for the chair assembly and pliers to remove the stapled webbing that keeps all of the pieces from shifting during packing and shipping. It has a small footprint as I keep both leaves down for every day dining. They only go up if I need to cut fabric. Placing the 2 chairs about 12 inches away from the table gives me enough room to use it with my cutting board! It is also gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Cutesnoot

customer_reviews.title: Real wood! Yes, that's right...
customer_reviews.text: I love my new table set. It's a perfect size for a small space. With the drop down leaf the round table fits flush against a wall. I bought the cappuccino set and it's real pretty. I did have a little trouble with the chair assembly, because I did it alone. Definitely get a partner to help hold those pieces together while securing it together. The table was literally just attaching the legs, so easy. Total assembly time 1.5 hours with over 1 hour of that time on the chairs. It's OK, I'm very happy with it. Real wood, not particle board. Sturdy enough for a larger person. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for price, short chairs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set for a small space. We bought it for my moms dining area in her small apartment. The table is very heavy and good quality, the chairs are as well. The only thing we did not anticipate was due to the small size of the table, it is quite a bit shorter than a full size table, which requires the chairs to be noticeably shorter. This was not a problem for us, as it will be mainly for my moms use and she is not super tall, however, you may want to consider the chair height when making your decision to purchase if it is for a taller person. It was pretty simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I carefully researched this product and saw several good reviews. I am ok with the table
customer_reviews.text: I carefully researched this product and saw several good reviews. I am ok with the table, but the chairs are terrible. They are too small and an adult male or anyone over 130 lb. could never feel comfortable sitting in them. Not only that the back of the chair is curved so that it digs into your mid-back and even a back cushion doesn't help. I am disappointed as I had to pay someone to assemble it and now I'm stuck with this set.
customer_reviews.author: B-Ma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and holds up well. Serves its purpose. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. Looks even more beautiful in person. I've had it for over 2 years with moderate use and it's still holding up nicely. Occasionally, a chair screw will get a tad loose, but that's an easy fix with the Allen wrench they include. The cushions on the seats aren't super duper lush, but it does the job. If you're going to be sitting for hours and hours, maybe not a good choice; but for quick 30-60 minute deals, not half bad. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Rue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Table
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, is exactly as described in the advertisement. This was easy to put together and my mother LOVES it! I am even thinking about buying another one to use as a breakfast nook in my kitchen. It is just right for 1 or 2 and when the leaves are dropped it is a tiny 'side table' size that is completely out of the way and still big enough to sit with a cup of coffee and the morning paper. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, nice, but they should lower the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me and my 2 year old in an apartment. I bought it knowing it was small. A bit overpriced for the table. It is not that special. Tried to cancel but they said it was too late (I think they could have cancelled but chose not to- It wasn't that long after purchase)and I could not return such a heavy package so I just used it. It is good for us but I regret spending this much money on it when I could have bought something much nicer for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Table is great, chairs are adequate but a bit small for me.
customer_reviews.text: Table is great, chairs are adequate but a bit small for me. Item arrived in good condition. Assembly for the table was easy. Assembly for the chairs was a little more difficult. Getting the screws to align with the threaded metal inserts was a pain. The table is the shining star of this set. It is very sturdy and looks good. The drop leafs are easy to raise and lower. The chairs are a bit small in seat width for me (6', 250lbs.). 2" wider seat would have been great. Should be fine for a smaller person. The chairs, although lightweight, appear to be quite sturdy and are reasonably comfortable. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: cutter

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive and chairs are very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very very pricey $$$ I regret how much I paid , The chairs and table are real wood , seems to be sturdy but the seats are extremely uncomfortable , very hard almost no padding.. like like the table it’s just not worth $350 maybe $130 maybe..... $350 I should’ve got more comfortable chairs but the chairs it that it comes with seems like they’re built more for children age 6-7yrs old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little table for my very tiny kitchen. Assembly took less than an hour and was easy to do even with just one person. The table itself only requires you to put the legs on and took less than 5 minutes. The chairs are more involved but still pretty easy to do and didn't take very long. A very nice little table for just my daughter and myself. I only wish I would have gotten it in the darker color but I'm still happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Affordable, Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Uhhhh I ordered on Wednesday and by noon Thursday it had arrived! Winning!! Listen people, this is a small table. It’s compact. I expected small and it was slightly smaller than what I anticipated. However, it’s a good purchase! If you live in an apartment or have a small space for a dining area...this is the set for you. ( If you have more than 3 people that need to constantly sit at this table together...I would likely suggest something else. ) This isn’t cheaply made, good solid quality wood. Overall...5 stars! If anything changes, I’ll edit this review.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: The perfect kitchen nook table
customer_reviews.text: Finding a dining room table that would fit a 4 foot space was more challenging than you think. I have diamond taste so trying to find something I could accent was extremely hard. However I am very happy with the set and plan to even put a elegant table cover across it to prevent scratches and nicks. It is dirty and both sides can fall down forming a square table instead of around one. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a table and chairs for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Fox Blog

customer_reviews.title: This table and chairs is amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: This table and chairs is amazing for the price. I couldn't believe how sturdy and attractive the set is. The seats are covered with faux suede and are quite comfortable. My only complaint is that in manufacturing, the screw holes were made too big, so we had to acquire larger screws. Otherwise, the ones that came with the chairs fell out. So far, the table hasn't had that problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lynn Castelli

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller people and small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I think is an adorable looking small table. Small being the key word. The coloring and fabric of this set is beautiful. The construction was a breeze but this is not made for big sized adults. They are lower to the floor than typical sets in the US and chairs are not supported for heavy persons, hence the four stars. My daughter in her first apartment loves how it fits against the wall. She can use it as a desk or pull the leaf up and eat with a friend.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: SPACE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I had a huge table that I loved but it was way too big for the space... After weeks of looking I went with this one... I should have had help putting it together... Took me at least 90 mins because I had issues holding the chair together... All the straps to hold the parts in the box were great... I didn't like fighting the giant staples to get the straps off... I'm 5'1 about 230ish and I have no issues with the chair or the size of the table.. The cushion is thin so if anything I'll add a little padding ..overall no complaints... I'm positive it will meet all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlise

customer_reviews.title: The table was really easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I got this table about a month ago. The table was really easy to put together, the chairs were a bit more of a challenge. It probably took me, my boyfriend, and his teenage son 30 minutes to our everything together? I love how it looks, and it's the right size for my small apartment. The only thing I don't care for is that the side supports on the table don't hold up the pieces that fold down super straight. The edges tilt down a tiny bit. Nothing tragic, just slightly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice piece and I do like it very much
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice piece and I do like it very much. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the product was late with a couple of days. It took them five days, instead of 2 as they advertise. Assembly is easy and material seems formidable. Please ship as you promise and you will secure multiple 5 stars. Thank you anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jack1

customer_reviews.title: Overally a good set of table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: Solid products and well made. Size is not big but ok, doesn't occupy much space. It's not very easy to assemble though - took two persons about 1 hour to get all done. However, there could be a screwer included to screw the black screw nails for the last step of assembling a chair, which is to fix the cushion of the chair to the rods. Another thing is the table legs - they are shaky after a few days use - have to screw them really tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Chairs too small
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are too small too for this table. I'd read other reviews that mentioned the chairs were too small but I guess I just thought they meant the seat was small or assumed that they were being overly picky; they were not. They chairs about two(?) inches too short for the table, small enough that they're sitting in my basement now and I'll never be able to use them unless it is for child seating at a table that sits lower to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: LissaMM

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set for a studio apartment
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for a studio apartment. It's great how both sides can collapse. It is REAL wood. It took my neighbor quite a while to put together, but I love it. BUT, the chairs are very low. I am 5' 3" and my knees are level. So, if you are much taller, you may want to think twice. I would measure it and let you know the height, but it is in storage now because my building was sold 5 months after I moved in. So, now it is storage. The chairs are comfy too. Coaster makes really nice things, always has. Not sure why the pic is upside down :(
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table set!! I did it alone and it took me about an hour to finish. I also had an electric drill so that helped a lot. I love the color coordination, It's perfect for me & my husband's studio apartment! The table was very easy to put together, however, it became a little more difficult when I got to the chairs but if you follow the instructions, it'll be fine 😊
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 6 months ago. It does look like the picture, however is not sturdy. My father (who is not overweight by any stretch of the imagination) was sitting on the chair, and it suddenly broke and he fell to the ground. The wood came apart at a very random spot, and not at the points which were manually connected. He hurt his neck and back, and it was incredibly painful to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a beauty, Coaster table & chairs
customer_reviews.text: What a beauty, perfect fpr my small kitchen area. The chairs are not heavy yet are VERY STURDY , do wish that they came with 4 chairs, but as you to can see there would ne no room. Now i know longer have to eat using my lap or a foldable tray. I feel that this is BT FAR the most wonderful purchased through AMAZON, THANKS TO AMAZON & COASTER
customer_reviews.author: Thedirtdigger

customer_reviews.title: Love this little table
customer_reviews.text: Love this little table! It fits my small, Boston apartment just perfectly. I was excited when it was delivered, but it stayed in its box for almost a week because I just KNEW it would be difficult to put together. Boy was I wrong! I put it together this morning and was so impressed with how simple, but well-made this piece of furniture is. It takes two people, but the instructions are straight-forward and the materials are easy to access within the box. AND IT'S REAL WOOD. I expected a poorer quality at this price, but was pleasantly surprised. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive or cheap? Sorry to say in this case, cheap describes price and quality. It fits nicely in the space it was intended for. Table is not balanced. Chairs are not comfortable, but are very stable. Took longer to put together than I would have thought, but not drastically so. I would not, however, recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Just Kit

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little table! It looks perfect in its little nook. I was concerned about assembling it, but a monkey could have put this together! All the parts were grouped for easy identification, and I had no difficulty assembling it myself. Time will tell how durable it is, but I am very pleased with the product and its price.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing dining set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing dining set for the price. It's sturdy and so easy to put together. The table went together in about 10 minutes, the chairs were a little harder. It would have been much easier if I had another person to help me with the chairs because it can be kind of tricky trying to balance the two sides of the chair to put them together. To be completely honest I think I put the chairs together wrong (the back slats are turned the wrong way... oops) but it's still functional and I'm too lazy to change it so it's still great!
customer_reviews.author: dot

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: WOW big disappointment! I was so excited for my new dining set I lugged it all the way up to my 4th floor walk-up apartment on the day the (giant, heavy) box arrived. Then when I unwrapped it I discovered a big ugly gouge on the table top!! The table was well packaged so this was not damage from shipment... someone put the item into the box this way. And it's not even on the leaf where it could be folded down or easily replaced; it's on the main part of the table. It seems like such a huge pain to return a large heavy item like this, I don't even know what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E

customer_reviews.title: Too light. Too small. Not for adults.
customer_reviews.text: Product is light, flimsy, and smaller than expected. Chair legs are too short for the table even for a 5’10” person. The legs are too close together for the chairs on the non-folding sides. Chairs are not easy to assemble and instructions are rudimentary and not detailed enough. I would definitely have returned this product if I hadn’t discarded the box prior to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: JerryL

customer_reviews.title: Lovely to look at but will it hold?
customer_reviews.text: Lovely to look at and somewhat functional, but the chairs don't feel sturdy at all. Even my mother, who weighs a measly 112 pounds, heard some creaking and a bit of "give" when she sat in one. But I do love the table. Might replace the chairs at a later date. To kind of give you an idea of how flimsy the chairs are, I can move one around my dining room using only my pinkie finger. Super light...feels like lacquered cork.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy P

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a kitchenette area in my guesthouse. Very attractive and sturdy. It was very well packaged, also, without a horrible amount of styrofoam. Took about 1.5 hours to put together the whole set, all those screws will no doubt make it strong and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: pumagirl

customer_reviews.title: Table and chairs fell apart in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this table and chair set for our condo thinking that it would last a while since it was made of real wood. Apparently it is not and the table and chairs have been falling apart during the first year we have owned it. I contacted the company to see if they would assist with a replacement but the representative said I was "out of the 1 year warranty period" so my only option was to buy replacement parts. Bad product, bad service, I'll stay away from Coaster products in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: Table seems to be sturdy and well made, the chairs fell apart after a couple months. Dropped this down to two stars as I realized the wood that the chairs are made up of is garbage and splinters and breaks almost explosively.
customer_reviews.author: The Wyoming Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great set for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical when my wife bought this but now I'm a believer. I'm 250lbs so when I saw this I said no way it can hold me, well it proved me wrong. Very easy to set up and surprisingly sturdy. Only gripe is its prone to scratching but what table isn't. Great table and chairs for the price
customer_reviews.author: Que

customer_reviews.title: Sent as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for my sister. She and her husband recently downsized to an apartment in a senior living complex so they have a small space for a table. The one thing they have talked about is it was difficult for them to assemble. It seems to be pretty well made and fits there space perfectly. My sister is not a small woman and she is able to sit in the chairs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact dining set
customer_reviews.text: This dining set is exactly what I wanted for my apartment. I don't have a designated dining area and this set is perfectly sized to fit anywhere. The table is quite sturdy. The chairs are sturdy enough to sit in to enjoy a meal, but definitely not comfy enough to sit and chat with your lunch companion. Overall, I would recommend this dining set. It was easy to put together and not too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: stefunnee18

customer_reviews.title: Fits the SPot
customer_reviews.text: The item assemble easily with a little help from a friend. I have it set in a corner of a living room as and addition sitting or eating space off from the kitchen. Its great color and crafted well. Very sturdy I know some who is 240lbs or more can sit on the chair without issues. Don't feel cautious about ordering it will be a simple purchase
customer_reviews.author: O. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great little set
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small apartment with an even smaller kitchen. This little dining room set fit perfectly in the spot I needed it too. The leaves fold down to give you even extra room. The chairs fit nicely under the table stores very efficiently. I would definitely recommend this little send to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Noyfb

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the set looks very nice. I got the natural wood. The table was a snap to put together. The chairs were a little more of a challenge. Lining up the cams that the bolts screw into is a little bit hit or miss. Took me about a 1:15 to assemble by myself. FYI, the legs do not form a square. The chairs only fit into the sides with the drop leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: im glad I saw this because I was going to look ...
customer_reviews.text: I a needed a small table w / 2 chairs, im glad I saw this because I was going to look at furniture stores,(which I hate) I saw this ordered it,table is really nice,clear finish easy to put together,chairs looks nice w/ set ,chairs I thought looked a lil for people on the light side,im 250 lbs so far holding good,now the table is real easy to put together,chairs are a different story,follow inst. for the chairs,im a retired carpenter so don't need inst right wrong on these chairs,table 10 min/chairs 1 1/2 hrs ,for $155 bucks I love it.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN KINGr

customer_reviews.title: Small set with perfect height chairs for my short legs.
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, solid wood construction, easy to assemble, instructions very clear. I am a 56 year old women and had it together in about an hour give or take I didn't rush. MY only complaint was the box it came in was all beat up and opened, I was glad I was home to catch the UPS drop off, it came off the truck like this I watched the driver put it on the dolly. Not sure who beat up on it but there would be no way to return it if I needed to in the same box it came it. Not that I am going to I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I am SO HAPPY I bought this table
customer_reviews.text: I am SO HAPPY I bought this table. It looks expensive even though it's not. I got the dark wood color and it looks so elegant. It is also very sturdy and I love that I can change the shape depending on where I put it. It has already been in several different spots of my house. The only negative thing I can say is that the pegs on the underside of the chairs sometimes fall out randomly. I just push them back in.
customer_reviews.author: Willene

customer_reviews.title: Elegant table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little table. The assembly on it did take some time (particularly the chairs). It looks really elegant and more expensive than it actually is. And it fits perfectly in my small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: The table is very solid and has a nice smooth finish. The dark tabletop makes it hard to keep it looking clean. The chairs are not comfortable to sit on. They are very light weight and seem flimsy. You're not large seats so when I would sit on them I would feel like I was sitting on the edge of the seat and lacking support. They also do not contour to your back well so you feel like you're sitting straight up. Assembly was easy and straightforward. I sold mine after two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: S83t

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved into a basement apartment and wanted a little table by the window where I could sit and eat while looking outside. This table fits perfectly and looks nice. It’s lightweight and not necessarily a solid piece of quality furniture, but definitely does the job in my situation. It was easy to assemble also.
customer_reviews.author: C. Humble

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with our Coaster 3-piece set
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with our Coaster 3-piece set. Quality seems good, and it provides a breakfast sitting without overcrowding the available area. Color matches the images in Amazon listing. Table assembles easily. Real tools recommended; although a small wrench and allen wrench are provided, I would not have wanted to do the job with only those. First chair took maybe half-hour to figure out what part goes where, but the second was done in 10 minutes. The chairs seem just a touch on the smallish side, but they are sturdy enough for adult use. Our delivery time was 16 days from order.
customer_reviews.author: Keys Cuda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my space
customer_reviews.text: I love this little table. I love that you can put the edges down or up as needed. I'm a big girl, and I just worked at it for 3 hours. The chairs are definitely able to hold a big girl, and they're surprisingly comfy for being so inexpensive. Definitely worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rustyoldknife

customer_reviews.title: 3 piece kitchen set Great Value excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small two chair with table and this is absolutely perfect the quality is great solid wood looks more expensive than what I paid for took me about 40 minutes to put it together by myself and I did it and it came out great absolutely love it highly recommended thank you so much for a great quality 3 piece kitchen set
customer_reviews.author: DIANE Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for Amall Apt
customer_reviews.text: This table and chair set is beautiful. It fits nicely into small space dining area. It is fairly easy to assemble with instructions. I chairs are somewhat uncomfortable to sit on. The backing to them feel awkward when sitting...the table itself is sturdy and a looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: K.G.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Ideal Set For Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: A well made dining set that is perfect for small places. I've had this set for several months and it has held up perfectly. It was easy to assemble, is easy to clean and has extra room if you need it with the fold up wings. I use it everyday and have entertained guests with no issues about enough space for everything. The chairs are comfortable and have held up well to sliding back and forth with weight on them. I'm very happy with this set and wish the company that sells it would sell the chairs separately as I would like to have a third chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Good table set
customer_reviews.text: The table is very nice and sturdy. Assembly was also easy. The chairs are kinda small, convenient for kids. Adults can use it for 30-40 mins. Chair assembly was tough. All parts looked the same. I wish they had more labels.
customer_reviews.author: Sarvajit

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great dining set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table for our RV after we removed the dinette. It fits perfectly and I love that it has the 2 adjustable leaves. For the price, I'm VERY impressed with this set. It's sturdy, solid, and stylish! Would definitely purchase this set again next time I need a table for a small space! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Really cute little bistro table set. It was exactly what I was looking for. As you can see in the pictures I covered the seats with a different fabric and plastic before assembly. This was to match my kitchen valance. The plastic is for my grandson and his cereal spills...lol. It appears to be sturdy. Not real big, so it fits in small areas like my kitchen nuck.
customer_reviews.author: D L Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: It’s attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is very pretty, fits perfectly in my small apt. Seems to be sturdy, was not too difficult to assemble as I did it myself without much problem. Since I’m a 78 year old great grandmother, I guess if I can do it anyone else should be able to assemble the set. Only problem I see is that the wood screws that attach the chair seats are not long enough, they are 1 inch and need to be 1and1/4 inch. I love my 3 piece dining set with drop leaf!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: This dinette set is fantastic! The way you assemble it is easy, smart, ingenious! We put it together in no time. Everything fit, no splintering or uneven matches. The furniture is small, light, but very sturdy and comfortable. Very impressed with this reasonably priced little set.
customer_reviews.author: Nurseontherun

customer_reviews.title: Quite comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's small apartment. Quite comfortable and sturdy. Leaves fold up or down in seconds. Put it together in half an hour. Very nice looking and adds a touch of brightness with its light color.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Set!
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly as described, no issues whatsoever. I LOVE THIS SET! Easy to assemble, SUPER sturdy, cute! You might need a cushion for the seats, but otherwise just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and solid parts
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and solid parts. But mine arrived with a damaged edge on the table top. Also, parts were missing after having been scattered all over the inside of the box (no extras provided). And watch out for jagged staples on under side that can rip fingers during removal of packing materials.
customer_reviews.author: Azoraa

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! Chair broke in less than 3 weeks under light use by a 130 lb person. Table arrived scratched. Do not buy! Returning.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, especially for the price. I didn't give it a 5 only because the chairs and table, though sturdy, are so light weight that it takes time to get used to sitting and standing in them without knocking them all over the place. I'm a pretty small girl (128 pounds), and even I'm too violent for this set. Though once I had it for a while, I got used to it and can better gauge how softly to sit and stand.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Centeno

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Chairs
customer_reviews.text: This table set looks nice, but the chairs break easily. If you have a heavier family, you may want to consider a table set that can support more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ynattirb

customer_reviews.title: Great for apartment
customer_reviews.text: Is the perfect table for small apartment. Seems sturdy and comfortable. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 was because the chairs were difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: belinda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described—which is good, since the idea was to match the decor ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described—which is good, since the idea was to match the decor (you'd swear this came with the couches)—and looks to be quite sturdy, especially for the $. I'm over 200 lb. and the chair didn't give in the slightest. (First day owner, may revisit later.) Assembly took me about an hour, no surprises. One note: I got exactly the hardware needed; there are no spares, so keep everything where you can see it during assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Assembler Beware
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you get what you pay for. However, WARNING - chair assembly is difficult. Spent a lot of time getting things to align while balancing the wood. What an incredible pain in the butt that was. Oh, and the instructions are just a few pictures. No tips. No hints. Just do it like the picture. Right...
customer_reviews.author: bob cermak

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: What a nice surprise to order something online and have it be better quality and nicer looking than advertised! Very sturdy and really nice wood - actual wood! The only thing that I would suggest is maybe getting seat cushions, as these are not that comfortable as they could be.
customer_reviews.author: SuzB

customer_reviews.title: Compact and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together. It is a sturdy table and chairs that is the right size for small spaces. I did add extra cushions to the chairs, but even those are sturdy. We use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good Set. good quality, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set for the money. Easy to assemble. Very sturdy. Don't believe the reviews that say otherwise. I also used Titebond on all of the joints. Good for small places such as in front of a coffee bar. Solid wood. Can't beat the price for less than $180.
customer_reviews.author: NorcalOldGuy

customer_reviews.title: You can do it
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! I put it together myself. I'm a female (girl power!) and it took an hour I believe just because the instructions are a bunch of numbers and photos. No words. I had to really focus towards the end trying to figure out if I have to screw in the cousions but generally not hard at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and well built.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking set. I bought this set for my dad who is in an assisted living. He really likes the set although he does say the chair bottoms are rather small. He says he doubts a large man would be comfortable in them. The set isvery nice for my dads needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great little table and chairs for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This little set is perfect for our RV! My husband and grandson put it together super quick and it fits great in the space where we needed it. I love that the sides fold down, it adds some additional space when we are not actively using the table but when you need a little more area for games etc, then up the sides go!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmac22

customer_reviews.title: Small kitchen's best friend!
customer_reviews.text: I love my little table, it is sturdy and solid, the finish is very nice, the little leaves are handy, it was easy and quick to assemble, and it is also (in my kitchen) an island, an extra counter, a buffet table, and a plant stand, on occasion! Because it is a natural wood finish, it MUST be protected from water and heat, but hot pads or trivets take care of that. A plastic-covered cloth keeps water off of it when I'm putting plants on it. It is a perfect size, too, and the chairs fit under the table, so they don't take up precious floor space.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Ricia

customer_reviews.title: but it's very sturdy and looks good when done
customer_reviews.text: This set is hard to put together, but it's very sturdy and looks good when done. It's also very heavy when delivered. Took 2 of us to drag it in, and 3 of us almost 3 hours to put together. Also had a hard time getting rid of the straps they stapled to the top to hold onto the legs and chair seats. You will need a wrench or claw hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Sized, Adjustable, Durable Wood, and great Budget Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table, fits my needs perfectly for a two-person, small but functional, kitchen table! Check out my full video review on YouTube, including a step-by-step on assembly of this Coaster table.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for my mom-in-law's studio apartment at the retirement home and it is the perfect size! The wood is a nice color and quality and the built-in chair cushions make it quite comfortable for sitting. My only issue is that the chairs are pretty small and probably wouldn't hold a very large person. But all in all, an excellent deal for the price and just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Vickey G.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in beige. I bought it for my recreational property over 300 miles away and did not open the box until I got there. The unit I recieved was cappuccino in color. It would be too much of a hassle to haul it home and return it so I will keep it. A friend and I assembled the table and chairs in about a half hour. It is well built and has a nice finish. If it was the correct color I would givt four or five stars. However I can only give it two stars as the person packing it was not paying attention to the color ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Sent Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Order a beige/natural set - received a dark walnut set. Not able to return due to fact it was a gift and now the window of opportunity to return has closed; Very disappointment Order a second one and it had better be beige natural..
customer_reviews.author: Paul Weber

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packed, no damage, no parts missing. I had two problems. FedEx dumped a package of almost 70 pounds at the bottom of my steps and lit out of there so fast I couldn't grab the driver. Also, the directions weren't great and left out a lot of steps. However, if this old lady who is in no way handy could put this together, so can you. And it's very nice looking and solid, much nicer than sets I saw in stores for over $500.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry G Liff

customer_reviews.title: Chairs too low.
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are very low to the ground - more like a table for children than adults.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth N. Lubin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value for such a LOW price!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT deal for the price! This was such an inexpensive table and chair set and has been holding up so well for the past few months. I am an average sized woman, so the chairs have been plenty sturdy for me. I have had some guy friends over for meals as well, I'd say upwards of 250 lbs and the chairs are very sturdy for them as well. If you can't afford to buy a really nice, really expensive kitchen table, this is an outstanding alternative. Also, the light wood finish looks very clean and professional. I've gotten some nice comments on that.
customer_reviews.author: DealWizard

customer_reviews.title: The table was extremely sturdy and felt like real wood to me
customer_reviews.text: For the price, couldn't beat it. I had this in use for myself with my boyfriend who is a sizeable man lol and he felt the chairs could have been a little bigger, but we had many meals here and nothing ever gave way or felt uncomfortable. The table was extremely sturdy and felt like real wood to me, which was worth it alone. Great for tiny spaces.
customer_reviews.author: songbird76

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! It is the perfect size for my kitchen. I was able to put in together in 45 minutes, less than the quoted 60. This was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: fan21

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small apartment
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's great. A little difficult to assemble the chairs. Looks good once put together. Comfortable enough, though I'm small myself. For larger people it might not be the best choice. Love that it folds smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and survived a move
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and (a testament to the designers) easy to disassemble a year later for a move and reassemble without instructions. Works well in small places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Lovely Wood Table
customer_reviews.text: Lovely quality wood table, once you've survived putting it together! Instructions are easy to follow, it just would have been easier with an extra set of hands, so invite a friend over to help you. I am pleased with both table and chairs and recommend to anyone whose kitchen needs some cheering up!
customer_reviews.author: CCrystals121Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and nice
customer_reviews.text: My grandson ( a college student) assembled it in no time and is very pleased with the it turned out and how it fits in his his small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Jiminysuzy

customer_reviews.title: For $140 this isn't a bad little table
customer_reviews.text: For $140 this isn't a bad little table. Keep in mind this is a SMALL table. That's what I wanted. The chairs are not super comfortable but not horrible either. The table is extremely easy to assemble--you simply screw in the legs. The chairs are a bigger challenge. On a scale of 1-10 with 10 being easy to assemble, the chairs are a 4. The product is true to the look you see in the photos. Not high quality stuff here, but again for $140 this set isn't bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Table
customer_reviews.text: This table fits great in my small kitchen and it actually added value to the kitchen in general. It's very modern looking and I've also received compliments on it. To maintain it, I would just wipe it down with a damp sponge on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Que

customer_reviews.title: Love it! pain to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love it! pain to put together! pain pain! but cute! also for flaps to stay out there are wood pieces under that slide out. Mine seem to get loose alot so have to keep adjusting. other than all that its pretty and practical
customer_reviews.author: HD Home Security

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This table & chair set fits perfectly in my small kitchen. It is comfortable to sit at & I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: RoseAnn Oldham

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's a little annoying that you have to assemble it. I'd say it's a "moderate" assembly project. BUT, I was very pleasantly surprised at the quality. It's all hard wood, and when properly assembled, very solid. All in all, for the very low price of this small dining table with two chairs, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: James C Froelich

product_meta.title: Coaster Home Furnishings 3-piece Dining Set with Drop Leaf Cappuccino and Tan
product_meta.description: Color:CappuccinoElevate the tasteful look and feel of a dining nook or parlor with this chic, stylish dinette set. Its compact size and sleek design blend effortlessly into rooms of all shapes, sizes, and decor styles. Soft, cream colored upholstery covers the plush, padded seats of its two comfortable chairs. The classic glamour of its round, wooden table is enhanced by the versatile functionality of a convenient folding leaf. A deep, rich cappuccino finish and sleek, graceful lines complete the glamorous look of this elegant three-piece set.
feature_bullets: Set includes: One (1) table and two (2) chairs
Materials: Asian tropical wood, Asian hardwood and Fabric
Fabric Color: Tan; Type of pattern: Seat cushion and wood design on seat back
Weight limit: Table - 120 lbs; chair - 300 lbs
Dimensions: Breakfast Table - Diameter: 35" | Height: 30" | Weight: 46.31 lbs | Stool - Width: 15.75" | Depth: 17.5" | Height: 18" | Seat Height: 18" | Seat Depth: 15"
Material Content: 100% polyester; Cushions: Attached, Leaf type: Drop down leaf

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,321 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
